item.title: Screencast topic requests?
item.description: I’ve received some great feedback on my first screencast. The suggestions have been helpful, and the compliments have made me want to create more free screencasts. At this point, I’m opening it up to you - what would you like to learn? Of course, I’m still planning to make a full set of screencasts for the MySQL DBA certification, but that will come later.
